explanation: [0-0] A young man in an orange long-sleeved shirt with a black belt is standing in the living room, his right index finger in his nostril. There is a TV behind him, a white bookcase beside him with many books and dolls on it. The man lowered his head slightly with a dignified expression. The subtitle "Anime vs" is displayed at the top of the screen.

[0-5] The camera zooms in on the man as he continues to pick his nostril with his finger. The scene then cuts to a round glass table with a metal hammer standing on it, with the subtitle "Thor's Hammer" appearing above. The camera then zooms in for a closer look at the hammer. Then the scene cuts back to the man in the orange shirt, who is standing next to the hammer. He puts his finger down from his nostril, takes a step forward, and then turns his head to the right. The scene then cuts to the doorway of the room, where two young men are standing inside. The man on the right is wearing a black leather jacket with his hands clasped in front of his stomach and his legs apart. The man on the left is wearing a yellow and white tank top, standing with his legs apart and his arms crossed over his chest. They are both looking forward.
